Volusion V13 Update – New Feature

As undertaking, Volusion has moved up the shutter on a handful of new rollouts. But, before we get on an adjective fury to show our cheerfulness for V13 updates like automatic tax rates, enhanced mobile capabilities, new storefront page editor and Volusion mobile apps, let’s cut to the track and get into some first-hand details. We used up the past week testing around with the different features and here are our experience.

Enhanced Mobile Commerce

With the people whoever purchasing directly from the tablet or phone, ecommerce online stores should be putting their first foot forward on mobile and android electronic devices. To help storeowners provide to on-the-fly consumers, Volusion has rolled out a delightful mobile commerce update.
Out-of-the-way from minor aesthetics improvements, the major functionality improvement appears at the time of checkout. Old checkout process was very time consuming consumer or mobile users would go throughout the purchasing cycle via a mobile-friendly edition of the site. Then, when time came up to complete the order, consumers were automatically redirected back to the non mobile edition of the checkout page.

Now, consumer will see a mobile friendly edition of their desire site at the time of entire buying cycle procedure, from start to cart. Whereas functionality of the item and category pages is comparatively intact, the checkout process is now become very easy to manage.

Now there is no need to spend a minute on non mobile friendly link to go from page to page. In its place user will get awesome and hurdle free cart experience, and owner will unavoidably get more and more conversion.
In addition, the upgrade edition gives owner the option to add number of custom field names for checkout pages. Owner can add custom contact details in the footer of the page and also get the capability to show detected credit card category when consumers enters credit card details.
